channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bike lane closed but somehow cars allowed??!, 12th August
item.description:
The bike access here has been blocked for weeks for some works on one side of the highway. There is *easily* space to allow a cycle lane next to it but they keep it blocked. Somehow, however, their own motor vehicles can magically fit where a bike canâ€™t. Please ensure these vehicles are removed and the cycle route reinstated urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Ground, Southwark, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Signs for motor vehicles blocking pavement, 12th August
item.description:
Signs and barriers which are to advise motor vehicle drivers are all over the pavement, blocking it and making it inaccessible for pedestrians. There is never ever a reason to put highway signs in pedestrian routes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Ground, Southwark, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree blocking pavement, 12th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Oswyth Road, Peckham, London

item.title: Two mattresses dumped in the courtyard, 12th August
item.description:
In the courtyard of Verden Court, Verdant Lane SE6 1LE. Two mattresses have been dumped in our courtyard near the car MOT garage we would appreciate their removal please.. and we will continue to watch for people doing fly tipping and take their registration number

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Verdant Lane, Catford South, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime E-Bike / E-Scooter, 12th August
item.description:
Arrived csc email 10/08/2025 Outside Favourite Chicken. Please clear a Lime bike Lat/Long - 51.4153934, -0.0534146 what3words - scary.target.issued Nearest address - 112A, High Street, Penge, London, SE20 7EZ
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 122 - 124, High Street, Penge, London

item.title: Overflowing bins, 12th August
item.description:
This rubbish is a repeat problem with domestic waste being put into two large recycling bins and being added to with fast food delivery waste - packaging and food. It is making the corner and the area near the bus stop on Norwood Road very unpleasant and unhygienic for all pedestrians and people waiting for the bus.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deronda Road, Tulse Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tip - Troughton Road, 12th August
item.description:
Network Rail and the Council need to discuss this fly tipping hot-spot and put in cameras to catch the perpetrators. A new dump has arrived in the last 24 hours. End of Troughton Road near the station canopy.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Troughton Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
